summary: The script creates an SMB server and supplies lightweight mechanisms to run system commands on a remote Windows host through SMB, supporting both one‑off command execution and an interactive remote shell while handling authentication, output capture, and cleanup.
business_intent: Enable security testers and red‑team operators to obtain remote command execution on Windows targets via SMB, facilitating penetration testing, post‑exploitation, and demonstration of SMB‑based attack vectors.
